libxml.py

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 # Copyright Thomas Nagy 2005
00002 # BSD license (see COPYING)
00003 
00004 """
00005 Find and load the libxml2 and libxslt necessary compilation and link flags
00006 """
00007 
00008 def exists(env):
00009         return true
00010 
00011 def generate(env):
00012         if env['WINDOWS']:
00013                 return #generate() doesn't work on win32, why? (js)
00014         if not env['HELP'] and (env['_CONFIGURE_'] or not env.has_key('CACHED_XML')):
00015                 from SCons.Tool import Tool
00016                 pkgs = Tool('pkgconfig', ['./bksys'])
00017                 pkgs.generate(env)
00018 
00019                 have_xml  = env.pkgConfig_findPackage('XML', 'libxml-2.0', '2.6.0')
00020                 have_xslt = env.pkgConfig_findPackage('XSLT', 'libxslt', '1.1.0')
00021 
00022                 # if the config worked, read the necessary variables and cache them
00023                 if not have_xml:
00024                         env.pprint('RED', 'libxml-2.0 >= 2.6.0 was not found (mandatory).')
00025                         env.Exit(1)
00026                 
00027                 if not have_xslt:
00028                         env.pprint('RED', 'libxslt-2.0 >= 1.1.0 was not found (mandatory).')
00029                         env.Exit(1)
00030
